fields.description:
I see this exception in the hive.log lately...I don't think it's sever; but it can be misleading...

{code}
2017-11-30T04:53:17,808  INFO [0a6aca14-c404-494e-b30b-a13f7ad19eb2 main] beanutils.FluentPropertyBeanIntrospector: Error when creating PropertyDescriptor for public final void org.apache.commons.configuration2.
AbstractConfiguration.setProperty(java.lang.String,java.lang.Object)! Ignoring this property.
